basic_information.scholarship_name: Captain Zane and Linda Skinner Family Charitable Scholarship for Science

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students with the College of Mathematics and Science. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Majoring in Biology Grade point average of 2.50 or higher Two faculty recommendation letters
